virtual std::vector<glw::IAnimation*> glr::models::IModel::getAnimations ( ) const
pure virtual

Sets the current animation. If nullptr is sent in as the animation, then no animation will be used when rendering this model.

Parameters
animationThe animation to use as the current animation.

Implemented in glr::models::Model.

virtual glw::IAnimation* glr::models::IModel::getPlayingAnimation ( ) const

Returns the current animation that affects this model.
